officialTitle: Effectiveness of Different Application Modalities of Dexamethasone on Clinical Parameters and Quality of Life After Lower Third Molar Surgery
inclusionCriteria:
* Healthy patients (ASA I)
* Bilateral symmetrically impacted lower third molars according to Pel-Gregory's and Winter's classification
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Heavy tobacco smokers
* Drug and / or alcohol abusers
